001package ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.model;
002
003import ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.data.bone.ExtraBoneData;
004import ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.data.model.AnimationType;
005import ltd.icecold.orangeengine.api.data.model.ModelData;
006import org.bukkit.entity.Player;
007
008import java.util.UUID;
009
010/**
011 * Model Entity.
012 * <p>
013 *     Get it via ModelManager.
014 */
015public interface ModelEntity {
016    /**
017     * Make all player clients render bound entity model that have been set.
018     * If you use {@link ModelManager#addNewModelEntity} you do not need to call this method again.
019     * @return ModelEntity
020     */
021    ModelEntity setModel();
022
023    /**
024     * Only let a player's client render a set entity model that is bound.
025     * @param player Player
026     * @return ModelEntity
027     */
028    ModelEntity setModel(Player player);
029
030    /**
031     * Set the entity model for all players.
032     * @param modelData Model
033     * @return ModelEntity
034     */
035    ModelEntity setModel(ModelData modelData);
036
037    /**
038     * Set the entity model for all players.
039     * @param model Model name
040     * @return ModelEntity
041     */
042    ModelEntity setModel(String model);
043
044    /**
045     * Only let a player client render a different model.
046     * @param player Player
047     * @param model Model name
048     * @return ModelEntity
049     * @see ModelEntity#setModel(Player, ModelData)
050     */
051    ModelEntity setModel(Player player,String model);
052
053    /**
054     * Only let a player client render a different model.
055     * @param player Player
056     * @param modelData Model
057     * @return ModelEntity
058     */
059    ModelEntity setModel(Player player,ModelData modelData);
060
061    /**
062     * Play animation.
063     * <p>
064     * Note: The plugin cannot determine if the animation exists for the model.
065     * @param animation 动作名
066     * @return ModelEntity
067     */
068    ModelEntity playAnimation(String animation);
069
070    /**
071     * Only let a player play the entity animation.
072     * <p>
073     * Note: The plugin cannot determine if the animation exists for the model.
074     * @param player Player
075     * @param animation Animation name
076     * @return ModelEntity
077     */
078    ModelEntity playAnimation(Player player,String animation);
079
080    /**
081     * Dynamic modification of bone.
082     * <p>
083     * Direct modification will result in the loss of existing additional data for the bone.
084     * Please use {@link ModelEntity#getBoneExtraData} to get the existing data before modifying it.
085     * @param boneName Bone name
086     * @param data data
087     * @return ModelEntity
088     * @see ModelEntity#getBoneExtraData
089     */
090    ModelEntity addBoneExtraData(String boneName,ExtraBoneData data);
091
092    /**
093     * Remove existing bone data.
094     * @param boneName Bone name
095     * @return ModelEntity
096     */
097    ModelEntity removeBoneExtraData(String boneName);
098
099    /**
100     * Replacing the default animation will take effect immediately for all clients.
101     * <p>
102     * Default animation settings are in the configuration.
103     * @param type Animation type
104     * @param animation Animation name
105     * @return ModelEntity
106     */
107    ModelEntity setDefaultState(AnimationType type, String animation);
108
109    /**
110     * Whether the entity is visible or not, using {@link org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity#setInvisible} also works.
111     * @param visible Visible
112     * @return ModelEntity
113     */
114    ModelEntity setVisible(boolean visible);
115
116    /**
117     * Whether to override the bounding box,
118     * the default is to use the bounding box size set in the configuration file.
119     * <p>
120     * Default: true
121     * @param overwrite Overwrite
122     * @return ModelEntity
123     */
124    ModelEntity overwriteBoundingBox(boolean overwrite);
125
126    /**
127     * Set the bounding box, which will override the profile bounding box size.。
128     * <p>It will take effect immediately for all clients.
129     * @param width Bounding box width
130     * @param height Bounding box height
131     * @return ModelEntity
132     */
133    ModelEntity setBoundingBox(double width, double height);
134
135    /**
136     * Lock the model yaw.
137     * @param yaw
138     * @return ModelEntity
139     */
140    ModelEntity setLockYaw(float yaw);
141    /**
142     * Lock the model pitch.
143     * @param pitch
144     * @return ModelEntity
145     */
146    ModelEntity setLockPitch(float pitch);
147
148    /**
149     * Unlock the model yaw.
150     * @param unlock
151     * @return ModelEntity
152     */
153    ModelEntity unlockYaw(boolean unlock);
154
155    /**
156     *Unlock the model pitch.
157     * @param unlock
158     * @return ModelEntity
159     */
160    ModelEntity unlockPitch(boolean unlock);
161
162    /**
163     * Dynamic modification of bone texture colour.
164     * <p>It will take effect immediately for all clients.
165     * @param bone Bone name
166     * @param red red
167     * @param green green
168     * @param blue blue
169     * @param alpha alpha
170     * @return ModelEntity
171     */
172    ModelEntity boneColor(String bone, int red, int green, int blue, int alpha);
173
174    /**
175     * Adding bone from other models to the current model.
176     * @param model Model name
177     * @param bonePart Bone name
178     * @return ModelEntity
179     */
180    ModelEntity addSubModel(String model,String bonePart);
181
182    /**
183     * Remove bone from other models that have been added.
184     * @param model Model name
185     * @param bonePart Bone name
186     * @return ModelEntity
187     */
188    ModelEntity removeSubModel(String model,String bonePart);
189
190    /**
191     * The client will only render a fixed model of the body
192     * at the current position.
193     * <p>
194     * <strong>
195     * Please set to cancel entity AI before setting, otherwise
196     * it will cause activities such as attacks on other entities
197     * by the entity that are not visible to the client.
198     * </strong>
199     * @param model Model name
200     * @return ModelEntity
201     */
202    ModelEntity inactive(String model);
203
204    /**
205     * Get extra data for a bone.
206     * @param boneName Bone name
207     * @return ModelEntity
208     * @see ModelEntity#addBoneExtraData
209     */
210    ExtraBoneData getBoneExtraData(String boneName);
211
212    /**
213     * Get the UUID of the entity to which the ModelEntity is bound.
214     * @return 实体
215     */
216    UUID getEntityUUID();
217
218    /**
219     * Get the bound model.
220     * @return Model
221     */
222    ModelData getModelData();
223}
224
